item.description: KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0680; 11:43AM; 2113 E 102nd St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3ySdia0; Watts; The first 28 firefighters extinguished fire in one two-story unit in 14 minutes, containing the flames to the unit of origin. Firefighters performed a primary and secondary search of the building and, thankfully, found no patients. The fire unit contained a functional smoke alarm, alerting occupants to the danger in adequate time to evacuate. No reported injuries. The cause of the fire is under investigation.; FS 65; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 15; AR1 BC13 E15 E21 E221 E233 E264 RA64 RA65 RA865 SQ21 T21 T33 T64 T9; CH9; 13; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#0680; 11:29AM; 2113 E 102nd St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3ySdia0; #Watts; Two-story government housing with fire showing. Firefighters deploying hose lines for fire attack, and engaging in an interior search.; FS 65; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 15; BC13 E15 E21 E221 E233 E264 RA64 RA65 RA865 SQ21 T21 T33 T64 T9; CH9; 13; Nicholas Prange

Physical Rescue; INC#1386; 07:40PM; 13055 W Victory Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3NskHRd; Valley Glen; One male patient (approximately 45 years old) sustained injury after an approximately 30-foot fall into the wash off of a bridge. LAFD firefighters and paramedics set up a rope system with a rescue basket and retrieved the patient from the wash below. The patient was transported to a local hospital in critical condition. Nothing further.; FS 102; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 2; BC10 BC14 E102 E239 E289 E89 EM14 HR3 RA5 RA889 RA89 T39 T89 UR88; CH8; 17; Nicholas Prange

title.a: KNOCKDOWN Greater Alarm Structure Fire - Fatality 05/19/2022 INC#1214

item.description: KNOCKDOWN Greater Alarm Structure Fire - Fatality; INC#1214; 06:33PM; 6600 W Lexington Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3G64Jdk; #Hollywood; It took 78 firefighters 51 minutes to extinguish flames inside of a portion of a two-story concrete industrial building. Two patients reported respiratory symptoms related to smoke exposure. Both patients were evaluated on scene and declined transport to the hospital. Sadly, one person was found dead inside, as firefighters searched the structure. No firefighter injuries. Cause under investigation. MEDIA: PIO Captain Erik Scott en route for media requests, ETA 7:55.; FS 27; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 13; AR1 BC1 BC11 BC14 BC18 BC5 CM22 E203 E227 E229 E235 E261 E3 E41 E52 E61 E76 E82 EA1 EM11 HR3 PH1 PI1 RA27 RA3 RA41 RA827 T27 T29 T3 T35 T61 UR3 UR88; CH7; 14 15; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#1214; 05:42PM; 6600 W Lexington Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3G64Jdk; Hollywood; Two-story center hallway structure with smoke showing. One patient reporting smoke-related symptoms.; FS 27; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 13; BC18 BC5 E227 E261 E41 E52 E82 RA27 RA827 T27 T61; CH9; 14; Nicholas Prange

Investigation, Police; INC#0605; 10:57AM; 107 Beverly Glen Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3LwJn9M; Westwood; A well-known 9-1-1 abuser (in both LAPD and LAFD systems) reported there to be bombs at both Fire Station 71 and the Federal Building in Westwood. LAPD has been notified and will respond to investigate.; FS 71; Batt 9; West Bureau; Council District 5; BC9 E71 RA71; CH7; 13; Nicholas Prange

Update KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0543; 10:58AM; 850 N Fuller Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3wpMMmx; #Fairfax; The first 26 LAFD firefighters, with assistance in automatic aid from LA County FD, extinguished the flames inside of a one-story vacant duplex in 38 minutes. No reported injuries. Cause under investigation.; FS 41; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 5; BC5 E227 E229 E261 E27 E61 E68 RA61 RA861 T27 T29 T61; CH9; 1; Nicholas Prange

Hoist Rescue; INC#1732; 10:59PM; 19000 W Braemore Rd; MAP: https://bit.ly/3wyFeN9; Porter Ranch; LAFD ground and air crews worked together to locate, treat, and transport a 20-year-old male who fell down an embankment (over 200 feet down). LAFD Air Operations transported the patient by air to a local trauma center in critical condition. Nothing further.; FS 8; Batt 15; Valley Bureau; Council District 12; AO1 AO2 BC10 BC15 E28 E287 E288 E290 E8 E88 E90 EM15 H2 H4 HA2 HA4 HR3 RA70 RA827 RA85 RA88 RH114 T87 T88 T90 UR88; CH8; 18; Nicholas Prange
